abstract: Loads and configures the persistent state of all tips in your app.
overview:
## Discussion

Call this function during app initialization. By default, all tips persist to a default location with a display frequency of [doc://com.apple.TipKit/documentation/TipKit/Tips/ConfigurationOption/DisplayFrequency/immediate].

To change the default location of where your tips persist use the convenience method [doc://com.apple.TipKit/documentation/TipKit/Tips/ConfigurationOption/datastoreLocation(_:)].

To change the display frequency use the convenience method [doc://com.apple.TipKit/documentation/TipKit/Tips/ConfigurationOption/displayFrequency(_:)].
